head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SECKLER, FAY (NEE LEVINE)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SECKLER, FAY (NEE LEVINE)

block.p: SECKLER-Fay (nee Levine), July 19, 2000, at the age of 92. Beloved wife of the late Samuel. Devoted mother of Jerrold and Madelyn Seckler, Marjorie and Steven Grad. Loving grandmother of Michael and Dawn. Cherished sister of Sylvia Levine, Hyman and the late Benjamin, Meyer and Sandy. Teacher at P.S. 139 in Brooklyn for over 30 years.

SECKLER-Fay (nee Levine), July 19, 2000, at the age of 92. Beloved wife of the late Samuel. Devoted mother of Jerrold and Madelyn Seckler, Marjorie and Steven Grad. Loving grandmother of Michael and Dawn. Cherished sister of Sylvia Levine, Hyman and the late Benjamin, Meyer and Sandy. Teacher at P.S. 139 in Brooklyn for over 30 years.
